body:
Heey resepignev here,

I have a Question regarding the old avicus site.
Well,I know the old.avicus.net site is taken down, but is there still a way to have acess to it?
I already tried to use the webarchiv, but it didn't captured all sites.
I hope you can help me with that.
Anyway, would you like to have also have acess to it, like the old.avicus.net site will be online again or not?

title: [Question] Old Avicus Website

replies.body:
There is no way you can access old.avicus.net because Ivy took it down.

I actually made a topic on this http://avicus.net/forums/00609ec87
And Yamatzu answered it with a quote from Ivy.
"What was its purpose? I took them down since I moved some servers around. The old forums weren't going to stay forever, only a few months. They are still available if there is some dire need."

Hope that helps!
